OrgName: FIS Management Services, LLC c/o Fidelity National Information Services, Inc.
activities:
FIS will be acquiring Personal Information by the following: 
•	European Economic Association (EEA) Clients will send financial reporting information to FIS for processing. 
•	EEA Clients will send accounts payable and accounts receivable management related requests (such as account status and information changes) to FIS for processing.  
•	EAA Clients will send general ledger and fixed assets management related requests (such as account status and information changes) to FIS for processing. 
•	Transaction-related data for varying financial products and services will be sent to FIS for processing.  This data will either be sent directly from EEA Clients or from their merchant customers. 
•	EEA Clients will send FIS contact information for their customers, so FIS may produce documents for the EAA clients which contain their customer’s contact information. 
•	FIS will support EEA Clients by providing assistance to the EEA Client’s technical staff.  
•	EEA Clients will send information access requests to FIS for processing. 
FIS will use the Personal information to perform its obligations under its EEA Client Agreements by the following: 
•	Processing transaction information on behalf of the EEA Client; 
•	Producing financial reports on behalf of the EAA Client;
•	Processing customer updates on behalf of the EAA Client; and
•	Providing EEA Client support or implementation services for the above activities and for FIS software.
contacttitle1: Corporate Compliance, Privacy, Risk, & Information Security Counsel
personaldata: client, human resources, organization, customer; manually processed data; financial data
